com.atakmap.android.maps.graphics.widgets

Class GLFahArrowWidget

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.atakmap.android.maps.graphics.widgets.GLWidget
      • com.atakmap.android.maps.graphics.widgets.GLWidget2
        • com.atakmap.android.maps.graphics.widgets.GLShapeWidget
          • com.atakmap.android.maps.graphics.widgets.GLFahArrowWidget
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FahArrowWidget.OnDesignatorPointChangedListener, FahArrowWidget.OnFahAngleChangedListener, FahArrowWidget.OnFahLegChangedListener, FahArrowWidget.OnFahWidthChangedListener, FahArrowWidget.OnTargetPointChangedListener, FahArrowWidget.OnTouchableChangedListener, MapWidget.OnVisibleChangedListener, MapWidget.OnWidgetPointChangedListener, MapWidget2.OnWidgetSizeChangedListener, ShapeWidget.OnStrokeColorChangedListener, ShapeWidget.OnStrokeWeightChangedListener

    public class GLFahArrowWidget
extends GLShapeWidget
implements FahArrowWidget.OnFahWidthChangedListener, FahArrowWidget.OnFahAngleChangedListener, FahArrowWidget.OnTouchableChangedListener, FahArrowWidget.OnTargetPointChangedListener, FahArrowWidget.OnFahLegChangedListener, FahArrowWidget.OnDesignatorPointChangedListener
    A GLMapWidget class that will display an arrow representing the Final Attack Heading towards a targeted IP and with an offset from some designator point. The widget will also display a cone that represents the offset width from the heading on each side. The final attack heading text value will be displayed above the heading arrow, as well as the text heading values of the cone's sides.
